mapper.insert: insert into ag_cms_fci ( app_id, fcm_id, fci_code, name, usage_scope, switch_flag, data_bind_flag, operator_code, remark )values ( #{e.appId}, #{e.fcmId}, #{e.fciCode}, #{e.name}, #{e.usageScope}, #{e.switchFlag}, #{e.dataBindFlag}, #{e.operatorCode}, #{e.remark})
mapper.select: select fci.*, fcm.id as fcm_id, fcm.name as fcm_name, fcm.type, req.data_url, req.data_request_method, req.data_request_params, req.data_request_headers from ag_cms_fci fci left join ag_cms_fcm fcm on fci.fcm_id = fcm.id left join ag_cms_fci_request req on fci.id = req.bind_id and req.bind_type=1 where fci.deleted=0 and fci.id=#{id}
select fci.*, fcm.id as fcm_id, fcm.name as fcm_name, fcm.type from ag_cms_fci fci left join ag_cms_fcm fcm on fci.fcm_id = fcm.id where fci.deleted=0 and fci.fci_code=#{fciCode}

select fci.*, fcm.id as fcm_id, fcm.name as fcm_name, fcm.type from ag_cms_fci fci left join ag_cms_fcm fcm on fci.fcm_id = fcm.id where fci.deleted=0 and fci.app_id=#{appId}
and fci.remark like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select fci.*, fcm.id as fcm_id, fcm.name as fcm_name, fcm.type from ag_cms_fci fci left join ag_cms_page_fci pf on fci.id = pf.fci_id left join ag_cms_app_page page on pf.page_id = page.id left join ag_cms_fcm fcm on fci.fcm_id = fcm.id where fci.deleted = 0 and page.page_code = #{pageCode}
